resources.string:
Green Flag customers 
can create an account to access: 
Car health updates 
Request a rescue online 
Policy information -
Invalid address. Must follow format of name@domain.com
Invalid password. Must be at least 8 characters and contain 1 upper case, 1 lower case, 1 number and 1 special character

Your password shouod contain 
8characters and include 1 upper
case, 1 lower case and 1 number.
 You can use special characters.
